meta.title: git push rejected permission denied をまとめて直す（権限/環境/手順）
meta.desc: 直近1ヶ月の投稿（10〜20件）を元に、原因パターン→チェックリスト→具体手順→FAQまで1ページに整理。

references.label: github: [EPIC] cp and pp portal start using with plant api layer with secure and robust pipe which will be used for all future api integration.
github: Ryan Marshall Duarte of Victor Montana
github: Test issue: Add a hello world endpoint
github: Disable assignment workflow for pull requests
github: Set timezone to US Eastern in nix home config
github: Manage wezterm configuration with home-manager
github: refactor: simplify E2E tests to focus on happy paths, move corner cases to unit tests

items.title: [BUG] Stack overflow
items.summary: 症状/環境が近い投稿。エラー文と権限・prefix・PATHが焦点になりやすい。
items.reply_draft:
I feel you — this kind of error is usually about permissions / install location / PATH / caches.
I summarized a step-by-step checklist (with common mistakes + fixes) here: https://mikann20041029.github.io/solve-multi-git-push-rejected-permission-denied-202601311614/
If you can share OS + Node/npm versions and the exact command, it's easier to pinpoint.
